resources.string:
When you open the app, you'll see three tabs at the top: "Must do," "Should do," and "Could do." These tabs represent different priority levels for your tasks.

* To add a new task, simply tap on the "Add Task" button located at the bottom right corner of the screen. This will open a dialog box where you can enter the details of your task.

* If you're in the "Must do" tab, you can set a due date and time for the task. You can also choose a color to visually distinguish your tasks. Enter a name for the task and tap "Save" to add it to the "Must do" section.

* Similarly, if you're in the "Should do" or "Could do" tabs, you can add tasks without specifying a due date or time. Just enter a name for the task and tap "Save" to add it to the respective section.

Once a task is added, you'll see it listed in the corresponding tab. If you want to mark a task as completed, simply tap the checkbox next to it. The task's text will be crossed out, indicating that it's completed.

* If you want to delete a task, swipe it to the left side. The app will prompt you to confirm whether you want to delete the task or not.
